item.description:
In my last email I talked of our sister meetup having a discussion meetup on “How Do We Get More Fashion Designers Involved in Our Events?” There have been some who have had difficulty RSVPing for that meetup. So I am making it a subgroup for this meetup as well. Then You can RSVP here. We need more designers to come for this discussion. How can we all help you?

The meetup is Jan. 20th at Starbucks, 6PM. Come prepared with questions and problems that we might collectively discuss . I look forward to seeing you there.

Best wishes,
Shirley, Assistant Organizer
http://www.shirleywil...
http://fashionsolutio...
item.name: Fashion Designers' subgroup
